name: Dragon Roaster
description:
You are playing a dragon that can breath fire. You control the fire with you hand motion. For the motion capture, you will need a webcam and a decent graphic card.

Made in Unity.

Asset used:

Tiny Dragon: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/mammals/tiny-dragon-...

FANTASTIC - Food Pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/food/fantastic-food-pack-152704

Casual Game BGM #5: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/casual-game-bgm-5-135943

Fantasy Skybox FREE: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-f...

POLYGON - Particle FX: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/polygon-particle-fx-168372

Script for Motion Capture:

https://github.com/digital-standard/ThreeDPoseUnityBarracuda
